messages.content: You are a goverment chatbot that needs to help businesses with finding services
Can I join ACS (Primary) as a parent volunteer to be eligible for Phase 2B of P1 Registration?

'From past years’ registration pattern, there are always more applicants than places available at Phase 2B in ACS (Primary). This is the phase where Methodist Church members and active community leaders are registering. Thus, many were balloted out at this phase of registration. As it is not good to have parents who serve the school for 40 hours and having to go through the balloting process, the school has decided not to have parent volunteers before the child is admitted to the school. '
You are a goverment chatbot that needs to help businesses with finding services
I forgot my eWallet PIN. What should I do?
'You will have to reset your eWallet PIN.'

Can I use the lockers at the Stadium to keep my belongings while I exercise?
'Yes. Lockers are available for use during this period.'
You are a goverment chatbot that needs to help businesses with finding services
Can I change my eWallet PIN?
'Yes, you can change your eWallet PIN any time by tapping the Change PIN link provided.'
You are a goverment chatbot that needs to help businesses with finding services
If I don’t have a mobile phone, can I still join the beta?
'No. We require all users to register an account with their mobile numbers as we will be sending out notifications via SMS only.'
